paragraphs.text:
%md
# Load Dependencies
First we have to load additional dependencies that we want to use. In this case we want to use a CSV parser.

Load Dependencies

First we have to load additional dependencies that we want to use. In this case we want to use a CSV parser.

val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(rdd)

df.collect().foreach(println)

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._

val rdd = sc.parallelize(
    Array(
        Row("Alice", 13), 
        Row("Bob", 12)
    ))
val schema = StructType(
    StructField("name", StringType, true) ::
    StructField("age", IntegerType, true) ::
    Nil
)
val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(rdd, schema)

df.collect().foreach(println)

paragraphs.text:
%md
## Accessing the RDD in the DataFrame

import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._

val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(Array(Person("Alice", 13), Person("Bob", 12)))
val result = df.select("name")

result.toZeppelin()

val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(Array(Person("Alice", 13), Person("Bob", 12)))
val result = df.select($"age", col("name"), 'age)

result.toZeppelin()

val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(Array(Person("Alice", 13), Person("Bob", 12)))
val result = df.select(df("age"), df("name"))

result.toZeppelin()

val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(Array(Person("Alice", 13), Person("Bob", 12)))
val result = df.select(concat(lit("Name:"), col("name"), lit(" Age:"), $"age") as "description")

result.toZeppelin()

result.msg:
name	upper_name
Alice	ALICE
Bob	BOB

paragraphs.text:
val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(Array(Person("Alice", 13), Person("Bob", 12)))
val result = df.select('name, upper('name).alias("upper_name"))
result.toZeppelin()

val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(Array(Person("Alice", 13), Person("Bob", 12)))
val result = df.select('name, ($"age" * 2).alias("double_age"))
result.toZeppelin()

result.msg:
number	text
1	odd
2	even
3	odd
4	even
5	odd
6	even
7	odd
8	even
9	odd
10	even

paragraphs.text:
val df = sc.parallelize(1 to 10).toDF.select($"_1" as "number")
val result = df.select(
        $"number",
        when($"number" % 2 === 0, "even").otherwise("odd").alias("text")
    )
    
result.toZeppelin()

val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(Array(Person("Alice", 13), Person("Bob", 12)))
val result = df.filter($"age" > 12)

result.toZeppelin()

val df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(Array(Person("Alice", 13), Person("Bob", 12)))
val result = df.filter("age > 12")

result.toZeppelin()

val df = sc.parallelize(1 to 100).toDF.select($"_1" as "value")
val result = df.select(
    sum('value).alias("sum"), 
    avg('value).alias("avg"), 
    min('value).alias("min"), 
    max('value).alias("max"), 
    count('value).alias("count")
)

result.toZeppelin()

val df = sc.parallelize(Array("Alice","Bob","Alice")).toDF
val result = df.distinct()

result.toZeppelin()

result.msg:
name	gender	age	height
Bob	male	13	146
Alive	female	42	159
Eve	female	19	169
Cyrus	male	27	178
Dan	male	32	186
Fiona	female	23	166

paragraphs.text:
case class Person(
    name:String,
    gender:String,
    age:Int,
    height:Int) 
{ }

val persons = sqlContext.createDataFrame(
    Array(
        Person("Bob","male",13,146),
        Person("Alive","female",42,159),
        Person("Eve","female",19,169),
        Person("Cyrus","male",27,178),
        Person("Dan","male",32,186),
        Person("Fiona","female",23,166)
    )
)

persons.toZeppelin()

result.msg:
gender	avg_age	min_height	max_height
female	28.0	159	169
male	24.0	146	186

paragraphs.text:
val result = persons.groupBy('gender)
    .agg(
        avg('age) as "avg_age",
        min('height) as "min_height",
        max('height) as "max_height"
    )

result.toZeppelin()

paragraphs.text:
val funny = sqlContext.udf.register("funny", {s:String => s.zipWithIndex.map(kv => if (kv._2 % 2 == 1) kv._1.toLower else kv._1.toUpper).mkString("")})

val result = persons.select(funny('name))

result.toZeppelin()

paragraphs.text:
val text = sqlContext.read.text("s3://is24-data-dev-spark-training/data/alice")
val words = text.select(explode(split('value," ")).alias("word")).filter('word !== lit(""))
val counts = words.groupBy($"word").count().sort($"count".desc)

counts.toZeppelin(20)
